scene_description_enriched: A figure, depicted in profile, plays a wind instrument. The figure has pale skin, white hair, and wears a purple robe with intricate folds. The background is a solid gold color, suggesting a divine or heavenly setting. The figure's hands are positioned to play the instrument, and their mouth is open as if blowing into it. The figure also appears to have red, wing-like appendages extending from their head.
